Findspot: Found/Acquired: Tell Dafana, "Qasr", east annex (C), chamber 17, probably
Curator's comments: Probably the "native sulphur in chamber 17" mentioned by W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, p. 75 § 72.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 75 § 72)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.88, p.188, pl.30)
